definition[0]: two characters, whose full names are Bill and Ben the Flowerpot Men, who appear in a popular British television programme for young children, first broadcast in the 1950s and 1960s, and again in the 2000s. Bill and Ben are little men made out of flowerpots who live in a garden and speak a language called ‘flobbadob’. In the original series, they had a friend, a tall flower called Little Weed who is called Weed in the later series.
